product_name: REI Camp Dome 6 Tent - Special Buy
long_description: Choose the REI Camp Dome 6 for family camping outings. Color-coded, equal-length aluminum poles and quick-attachment clips make setup quick and easy; hexagonal shape provides roominess around the shoulder area. Seam-sealed rainfly and a weatherproof door and rear window, both with an awning, ensure wet-weather protection. Camp Dome 6 has bug-proof mesh in door, rear window and side panels for enhanced air circulation. Strong 7001-series aluminum main poles and fiberglass brow poles are reliable and long lasting. Heavy-duty floor fabric is waterproof and durable; seam-sealed bathtub design with no-wick corner construction ensures that water won't sneak through susceptible areas. Mood-elevating colors create a pleasant interior even when the weather outside is less than perfect. 4 interior pockets provide convenient storage. The Camp Dome 6 tent includes stakes, guyline and compression storage sack. Special buy.
short_description: Choose the REI Camp Dome 6 for family camping outings.
